alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and south central Broward Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weston, or 9 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, Pembroke Pines, Miramar, Davie, Miami Gardens, Weston, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Hialeah Gardens, Medley, Palm Springs North, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Country Club, Pennsuco, Miramar Parkway And University Drive, Hard Rock Stadium, Mile Marker 30 On Alligator Alley, Intersection Alligator Alley And Miami Canal and Intersection Krome And U.S. 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
